title: Cat Carriers From Petco Be Prepared for Emergencies
description: For the Holidays Petco had a grant a wish on their Twitter called #dearpetco. We sent them a tweet for Cat Carriers.  AND THEY GRANTED OUR WISH!!!!!! WE really needed 2 large carriers because we live in Los Angeles, in a fire danger, mud slide area (and o

asset.author: Petco
asset.hookText:
For the Holidays Petco had a grant a wish on their Twitter called #dearpetco. We sent them a tweet for Cat Carriers.  AND THEY GRANTED OUR WISH!!!!!! WE really needed 2 large carriers because we live in Los Angeles, in a fire danger, mud slide area (and of course earthquakes) We had lent ours to a friend and we never got them back.  We needed two large ones for Merlin and Yogi, who are over 20 lbs. 

THANK YOU PETCO!!!! 
http://www.petco.com/
https://twitter.com/Petco

We were sooooo excited to receive $25 dollar gift cards. That was so amazing (and SURPRISING) we went on www.petco.com and priced the different carriers. We saw that we could afford 3 of the 400 series and the carriers were on sale with free shipping! We ordered them and they arrived 4 days later. We feel so much safer knowing we have good carriers and supplies for all the cats.

We keep about a months worth of cat food, plus other supplies. We are going to include a list here from

http://www.aspca.org/pet-care/disaster-preparedness/
Basic Emergency Supplies / Traveling Kit 
3-7 days' worth of  food
Disposable litter trays (aluminum roasting pans are perfect)
Litter or paper toweling
Liquid dish soap and disinfectant
Disposable garbage bags for clean-up
Pet feeding dishes
Bottled watertwo
A traveling bag, crate or sturdy carrier, ideally one for each pet
Flashlight
Blanket (for scooping up a fearful pet)
Especially for cats: Pillowcase or EvackSack, toys, scoopable litter

Kitties; Merlin, Fairy Princess, Elfin, Buddha and Yogi.
